page.title: 02Templepatrick Leisure
page.content: After doing a survey in Templepatrick Primary School,we found that thirty two boys are in the B.B.(BOYS BRIGADE) and thirty girls are members of the G.B.(GIRLS BRIGADE) Also we found that eight girls are in the Guides and six boys are the Scouts. Forty familes have a home computer; And also five people were members of the Horticultural Society. Most people spend their{LEISURE watching{TELEVISION}and I.T.V is the most popular of 4 channels with 76 out of the 93 people interveiwed watching it.Out of{6 RADIO}stations DOWNTOWN and RADIO 1 are the favourites.Ten people prefer computer games to T.V. and 18 prefer fishing.The most popular river to fish in is the Six Mile which is our local river.
